sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		{Rotton Tomato} as integer,
		dateOfETL as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> source1

transformations.name: Aggregate1
transformations.script:
source1 aggregate(groupBy(ltitle = lower(title)),
	movie = last(movie),
		occurences = sum(1)) ~> Aggregate1
